alert.note: Alert for Green; Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lafayette, Green and southeastern Iowa Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 330 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Apple River, or 15 miles south of Darlington, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Darlington, Shullsburg, Monticello, Argyle, Blanchardville, Apple River, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Waldwick, Fayette, Lamont, Hollandale, Browntown, Gratiot, Calamine, Lead Mine, Juda, and Jordan Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
